author: KentFoodies
title: Lovely hotel in a good location
text:
This hotel is situated at the old north gate of the city within easy walking distacne of all the main attractions the furthest being the Collosseum at 40 minutes and 30 mins to the vatican City, it is also ideally situated for the Metro station which is at the top of the road.
The hotel is very clean and all of the staff very friendly and helpful. The rooms may be samll for some but suited our needs the only small critisism that I would have is that there were no faciliies in teh room to make your own tea or coffee but that is minor.
The breakfast is very good and the happy hour in the bar amazing, 3 Euros for a beer with free snacks is all anyone could ask. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel.
